i.name: Spider Queen
i.description:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

q.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
q.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

w.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
w.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.

e.name: Cocoon / Rappel
e.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.

r.name: Spider Form
r.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.

i1.blurb: Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling. Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.
description: {{sbc|[[File:EliseSquare.png|'''Human Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Human Form''']] - Innate:}} When '''Elise's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] hits a target she gains one dormant ''Spiderling'', up to {{pp|4|showtype=true|type = [[File:EliseSquare.png|20px|link=]] Human Form's Rank|2 to 5}}.

{{sbc|[[File:Spider_Form.png|'''Spider Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Spider Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Spider Form''']] - Innate:}} '''Elise's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{pp|4|showtype=true|type = [[File:Spider Form.png|20px|link=]] Spider Form's Rank|10 to 40|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} and {{tip|heal}} her for {{sti|health|icononly=true}} {{pp|4|showtype=true|type = [[File:Spider Form.png|20px|link=]] Spider Form's Rank|4 to 10|color=health}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|health}} [[On-hit effect|on-hit]].
i1.name: Spider Queen
notes: * ''Elise'' will always begin the game and respawn with maximum available ''Spiderlings'' stored.

* ''Elise's'' {{sbc|[[File:EliseSquare.png|'''Human Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Human Form''']]}} ability casts can only store one ''Spiderling'' each.

riot.name: Spider Queen
riot.description:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

riot.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
riot.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
riot.tooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: {{ e2 }}.

q1.blurb: Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.
description: {{sbc|{{cci|EliseSquare.png|Elise#Human Form|'''Human Form'''}} - Active:}} '''Elise''' fires toxin at the target enemy unit, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|40 to 180}} {{as|(+ 4% {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''current''' health)|health}}|Max. Monster Damage|{{ap|115 to 355}}}}
q1.name: Neurotoxin
notes: * No additional details.

riot.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
riot.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
riot.tooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: {{ e2 }}.

q2.blurb: Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
description: {{sbc|[[File:Spider_Form.png|'''Spider Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Spider Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Spider Form''']] - Active:}} '''Elise''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy and bites them, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, capped against monsters.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 230}} {{as|(+ 8% {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''missing''' health)|health}}|Max. Monster Damage|{{ap|145 to 405}}}}
q2.name: Venomous Bite
notes: * Any {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderling}} currently active will leap with her when she uses the ability and will reprioritize this new target.
** A {{ai|Volatile Spiderling|Elise}} will also leap to ''Venomous Bite's'' target if one is nearby.
* ''Venomous Bite'' cannot be used to cross walls or impassable terrain.
** The target will be damaged regardless.
*** {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} can cross walls and terrain to reach ''Venomous Bite's'' target and will attack provided Elise stays within their leash range.

riot.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
riot.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
riot.tooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.

w1.blurb: Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.
description: {{sbc|[[File:EliseSquare.png|'''Human Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Human Form''']] - Active:}} '''Elise''' summons a venom-gorged spider for 3 seconds, which moves in the target direction.
The spider explodes upon contact with an enemy unit or at the end of its lifespan, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies.

If the spider does not hit an enemy before reaching the target location, it re-targets and chases down a nearby enemy, prioritizing {{tip|champion|champions}}. The spider gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, based on its proximity to its target.
w1.name: Volatile Spiderling
notes: * No additional details.

riot.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
riot.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
riot.tooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.

w2.blurb: Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
description: {{sbc|[[File:Spider_Form.png|'''Spider Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Spider Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Spider Form''']] - Passive:}} '''Elise's''' {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} gain {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.

{{sbc|[[File:Spider_Form.png|'''Spider Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Spider Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Spider Form''']] - Active:}} '''Elise''' and her {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise|Spiderlings}} gain {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 3 seconds.
''Skittering Frenzy'' resets '''Elise's''' autoattack timer.
w2.name: Skittering Frenzy
notes: * ''Skittering Frenzy'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Elise's'' previous orders.

* ''Elise'' loses the attack speed bonus immediately when turning back to {{sbc|[[File:EliseSquare.png|'''Human Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Human Form''']]}}.
** But if she is able to transform back in less than 3 seconds (only via sufficient [[cooldown reduction]]) she gets the bonus back for its remaining duration.

riot.name: Cocoon / Rappel
riot.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.
riot.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

e1.blurb: Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.
description: {{sbc|[[File:EliseSquare.png|'''Human Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Human Form''']] - Active:}} '''Elise''' fires a web in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of the first enemy hit for 1 second and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them.
e1.name: Cocoon
notes: * No additional details.

riot.name: Cocoon / Rappel
riot.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.
riot.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

e2.blurb: Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
description: {{sbc|[[File:Spider_Form.png|'''Spider Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Spider Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Spider Form''']] - Active:}} '''Elise''' lifts up into the air, becoming {{tip|untargetable}} for up to 2 seconds and {{tip|sight|revealing}} the area for the duration. While she's in the air she can select a target to instantly descend upon.
If cast directly on an enemy, '''Elise''' automatically descends upon them after 1 second. Upon landing, '''Elise's''' {{ai|Spider Queen|Elise}} bonuses are increased for 5 seconds.
e2.name: Rappel
notes: * When ''Elise'' casts ''Rappel'' a circle shows the area in which a target or location can be selected.
*''Elise'' only gains an increase in her passive bonuses if she directly targets an enemy with ''Rappel''.
** Elise cannot descend outside the bounds of this circle.
* Elise can cast ''Rappel'' on any targetable enemy unit ([[minion]]s, [[monster]]s, [[champion]]s, [[Champion summoned units|pets]], wards, and traps (provided she has {{tip|true sight}})).

riot.name: Spider Form
riot.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
riot.tooltip:
Elise transforms into a menacing spider, sacrificing 425 attack range in exchange for {{ e3 }} movement speed and access to arachnid abilities. All dormant Spiderlings are awakened and will attack nearby foes.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.

r1.blurb: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} {{ais|Spider Queen|Elise}} bonuses are increased.

{{sbc|[[File:EliseSquare.png|'''Human Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Human Form''']] - Active:}} '''Elise''' transforms into a menacing spider, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|25 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{tip|melee}} basic attacks with 125 {{sti|range}}, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, '''Elise''' unleashes all stored ''Spiderlings''.

{{sbc|[[File:Spider_Form.png|'''Spider Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Spider Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Spider Form''']] - Active:}} '''Elise''' transforms into her human form, gaining {{tip|ranged}} basic attacks, and access to her human abilities. Additionally, '''Elise''' stores all unleashed ''Spiderlings''.
'''Elise''' begins with one rank in ''Spider Form / Human Form'' and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
r1.name: Spider Form / Human Form
notes: * Both ''Spider Form'' and ''Human Form'' have no cast time and do not interrupt ''Elise's'' previous orders.
** ''Spider Form'' and ''Human Form'' have separate cooldowns.
* ''Spider Form's'' heal will not trigger when attacking structures.
* Neither transformation counts as an activation for the purposes of items such as {{ii|Tear of the Goddess}}, {{nie|Spellblade}}, and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The triggering attacks will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Spider Form's'' bonus damage.
** ''Spider Form's'' bonus damage does not affect structures.
** {{Pending for test}}: ''Spider Form's'' relationship with {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parry}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|block}}, and {{tip|blind}}.

riot.name: Spider Form
riot.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
riot.tooltip:
Elise transforms into a menacing spider, sacrificing 425 attack range in exchange for {{ e3 }} movement speed and access to arachnid abilities. All dormant Spiderlings are awakened and will attack nearby foes.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.

r2.blurb: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} {{ais|Spider Queen|Elise}} bonuses are increased.

{{sbc|[[File:EliseSquare.png|'''Human Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Human Form''']] - Active:}} '''Elise''' transforms into a menacing spider, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|25 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{tip|melee}} basic attacks with 125 {{sti|range}}, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, '''Elise''' unleashes all stored ''Spiderlings''.

{{sbc|[[File:Spider_Form.png|'''Spider Form'''|20px|link=Elise#Spider Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|'''Spider Form''']] - Active:}} '''Elise''' transforms into her human form, gaining {{tip|ranged}} basic attacks, and access to her human abilities. Additionally, '''Elise''' stores all unleashed ''Spiderlings''.
'''Elise''' begins with one rank in ''Spider Form / Human Form'' and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
r2.name: Spider Form / Human Form
notes: * Both ''Spider Form'' and ''Human Form'' have no cast time and do not interrupt ''Elise's'' previous orders.
** ''Spider Form'' and ''Human Form'' have separate cooldowns.
* ''Spider Form's'' heal will not trigger when attacking structures.
* Neither transformation counts as an activation for the purposes of items such as {{ii|Tear of the Goddess}}, {{nie|Spellblade}}, and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The triggering attacks will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Spider Form's'' bonus damage.
** ''Spider Form's'' bonus damage does not affect structures.
** {{Pending for test}}: ''Spider Form's'' relationship with {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parry}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|block}}, and {{tip|blind}}.
